title: Review: Dog Is Dead – Glockenspiel Song
content:
So after checking out these guys at Dot to Dot Festival last week, we can safely say they are one of the bands to watch out for in the coming year. Combining pop, rock and jazz influences, they create perfectly rounded energetic, bouncy tunes, which are easy on the ears as well as being joyfully uplifting. Having received rave reviews from Drowned In Sound, as well as Huw Stephens declaring himself a fan, Dog is Dead are certainly destined for bigger things. Their debut single “Glockenspiel Song” is released on itunes today, and is a mesmerising pop spectacular, part Guillemots, part Los Campesinos!, the song reaches it’s pinnacle with the guys shouting “we are a mess! we failures! and we love it!” over the top of a scintillatingly played saxophone. So if you have a spare 79p, there are few better ways you could spend it than on Dog Is Dead’s debut single.
